Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Good game. Help keeps the kids calm and out of trouble. Good way to monitor their farming skills. No more than a hour a day .

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the money
Reviews.Author: jkblank
Reviews.Content: The phone definitely met my expectations.  With Windows 8 OS on the phone it has more features then most phones have in this price range.  Features like Microsoft Word and Excel aren't going to be on a phone using android OS or an iPhone for that matter.  Even powerpoint is an option with this phone.  If you own a PC I think you will find this phone to be very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Mahdia Choudhury
Reviews.Content: with the price, its a good deal. But the battery won't stay in place often times( happened to me the day after of my purchase).Picture quality poor.Shipped on time.

Reviews.Title: Great windows phone
Reviews.Author: pavel guido
Reviews.Content: The phone is great for the price even though it was att branded it was completely unlocked and brand new

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: luis manrrique
Reviews.Content: I like the product very easy to use and configure, very good performance, recommended for anyone from the most basic to the most advanced
